formula: a(n) = sum of phi(e) where e ranges over all non-divisors of n that are between 1 and n. - _Joseph L. Pe_, Oct 24 2002a(n) = A002088(n) - n.
mathematica: f[n_] := Module[{s, i}, s = 0; For[i = 1, i < n, i++, If[Mod[n, i] != 0, s = s + EulerPhi[i]]]; s]; Table[f[i], {i, 1, 100}]
author: _Joseph L. Pe_, Oct 24 2002
